data.eml:eml: Two new species of the laomediid genus Naushonia Kingsley, 1897 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Gebiidea) from the Indo-West Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Anker, Arthur (2010): Two new species of the laomediid genus Naushonia Kingsley, 1897 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Gebiidea) from the Indo-West Pacific. Zootaxa 2504: 31-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.195870
